ReportSection.title: Incrementation
ReportSection.ReportItem:
I am writing to inform you that you will receive a pro-rated increment as per Article A6.11.2 of Schedule A, which provides that an Academic Faculty member whose appointment takes effect in the period October 2 to June 1, inclusive, is eligible to receive a pro-rated increment. The award takes effect on July 1, 2023.

I would like to take this opportunity to wish you continued success in your teaching, research and service.
